items.headline: Retail sales fizzled at the end of the holiday season, as tariffs alter Americans’ buying habits.
items.summary_en: Sales at U.S retailers fizzled at the end of the holiday shopping season, suggesting consumers worried about the economy might be cutting back on spending as a new year got underway.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.
